mapper.sql: p.Id , p.Name , p.Price , p.RalPrice , p.Pic , p.Type , p.Stock , p.Order , p.InsertBy , p.InsertDate, p.UpdateBy , p.UpdateDate, p.Remarks , p.DelFlag , up.Id AS "userProducts.Id" , up.UserId AS "userProducts.UserId" , up.ProductsId AS "userProducts.ProductsId" , up.Number AS "userProducts.Number" , up.InsertBy AS "userProducts.InsertBy" , up.InsertDate AS "userProducts.InsertDate" , up.UpdateBy AS "userProducts.UpdateBy" , up.UpdateDate AS "userProducts.UpdateDate" , up.Remarks AS "userProducts.Remarks" , up.DelFlag AS "userProducts.DelFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT FROM gg_user_products up, gg_products p WHERE p.Id = up.ProductsId and UserId = #{userId} AND p.DelFlag = '1' AND up.DelFlag = '1'

SELECT p.Id ,p.Name ,p.Price ,p.RalPrice ,p.Pic ,p.Type ,p.Stock ,p.Order ,p.InsertBy ,p.InsertDate,p.UpdateBy ,p.UpdateDate,p.Remarks ,p.DelFlag FROM gg_products p WHERE p.DelFlag = #{delFlag} AND p.Type = #{type} GROUP BY p.`Order` ASC
